INSERT INTO PROD_BOM_DETAIL_PLM ( ID, BOM_NO, SERIAL, MATTERS_NO, PARENT_NO, NORMS, PARAM, MODEL_DESC, MAT_VERSIONS, AMOUNT, UNIT, CRAFWORK_ID, BRAND, BACKUP_MATTER, SON_BOM_NO, PLM_DESC, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, COMPANY_ID, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serial,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mattersNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{norms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matVersions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backupMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sonBomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plmDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PROD_BOM_DETAIL_PLM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROD_BOM_DETAIL_PLM
BOM_NO = #{bomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERIAL = #{serial,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MATTERS_NO = #{mattersNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_NO = #{parentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NORMS = #{norms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM = #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_DESC = #{modelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAT_VERSIONS = #{matVersions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFWORK_ID = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
BRAND = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACKUP_MATTER = #{backupMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SON_BOM_NO = #{sonBomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLM_DESC = #{plmDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
